El visionario empresario Zhao Long Ji.

"Hey, look at me, you've got this, you look so handsome,"
translation.es: "Mírame. Lo lograrás. Te ves muy guapo." solo fue para que reparara tu teléfono.

translation.en: [Will] Try turning it off and on again.
90% of the time, you can fix a problem by turning it off and on again.

translation.en: So, did you, uh, try turning it off and on again?

translation.es: No. Me gusta más cuando tú lo haces.Te da una sensación de logro.

-[Sarah gasps] Pandas. -Daddy's gonna go make that bacon.

- ¡A mí!- ¿A quién ama papá? - ¡A mí!- ¡A mí!

Okay, okay, you know what? You're both right.

Mmm, thank you. It's so good to see you.

cuando todo el mundo se ha ido.

Get out of here, go have fun. I'll see you tonight, honey.

Hey, look. Thanks for putting in a good word.

Thank God. My wife only taught me one phrase.
translation.es: Qué bueno.Mi esposa solo me enseñó una frase.

After your independent third-party assessment is approved,
translation.es: Cuando se apruebe su valoración externa,

translation.es: confirmarán la cobertura total de La Perla

Las medidas antiincendios de La Perla

translation.es: amplios rociadores y una matriz de CO2que apaga un incendio

translation.en: All monitored by a control facility located over a mile away.

translation.es: Me contrató para evaluarsus sistemas de seguridad,

translation.en: and after a complete analysis, I can say that it's the safest
translation.es: y después de un completo análisis, puedo decir que esla superestructura más segura del mundo.
puedo decir que esla superestructura más segura del mundo.

translation.es: Es Fort Knox,a kilómetro y medio del suelo.

translation.es: Una vez que verifiquela seguridad en la base remota,

make this sphere the eighth wonder of the world.

translation.en: with embedded 8K micro cameras on both sides.
-But, like, cool or creepy? -Uh, little of both.

translation.en: Yeah, but things are a lot different now. I got a wife and kids,

translation.en: and I haven't touched a gun in 10 years.

translation.en: I just kind of put my sword down, you know?
and I'm just never gonna pick it up again.
translation.es: y jamás la volveré a levantar.

translation.en: You know, he was wearing a vest. There's no way you could've known that.

translation.en: You know, the funny thing is, without that bad luck, I, uh...
translation.es: Lo curioso es que sin esa mala suerte,

translation.en: I never would've had my kids.
I don't know who I'd be without my family.
translation.es: No sé qué sería de mí sin mi familia.
Me sentiría perdido. Sería… Serías yo.

translation.en: Come on, man, I'm sorry. I didn't mean it like that. Come on.

translation.en: [Will] The kids are really excited about the nighttime feeding.
translation.es: Los niños están emocionadoscon la alimentación nocturna.

translation.en: [Ben] Yeah, it's a blast. They'll be there all night.
translation.es: Sí, es increíble. Estarán ahí toda la noche.

translation.en: -Thanks for taking me to the off-site. -No worries.
translation.es: Gracias por llevarme al centro remoto. De nada.

translation.en: I mean, dinner's on you, of course.

Ay, no. - Se ve feo.- Sí.

translation.en: You're gonna need some stitches for that, though, man.

translation.es: - Tengo que llamar a Sarah.- Sí.

translation.en: Yeah, I put it in my jacket before we left.

translation.en: -How's that for luck, huh? -Yeah, man. Nice one.
translation.es: Qué suerte, ¿eh? Sí, hermano. Bien hecho.

translation.en: Thought we were both gonna get fired for that.
translation.es: Creí que nos iban a despedir.

translation.en: Well, we didn't really get to see them
because Henry ate a weird candy and started throwing up,

- Los veré pronto.- Está bien. Adiós.

Creímos que el piso estaba vacío. Sí, yo también.¿Todo en orden?
Sí, yo también.¿Todo en orden? Todo está bien.

I didn't know they were active yet.
Well, they will be when we finish with them.
Well, look at this precious little pair.
You got the run of the castle on this floor.

translation.en: They were supposed to be gone.
-I know. -Want me to clean that up?
-What's up? Where you going? -I got to go.
Henry's not feeling well. They went back to The Pearl.

translation.en: All right. I'll call you tonight. What a day, huh?
You're not gonna make it in time.

translation.en: You should've just left it in the bag.

translation.en: Ben, what are you talking about?
You screw up, you get a whole new life.

translation.en: You don't know these people, Will.
but you don't want to do this.
Let's get you up. Come on, let's go. Sit up. There we go.

translation.en: Hold this here. Hold it tight.
I need you to tell me what happened, okay?
All right? I can help you if you tell me what happened.
translation.es: Puedo ayudarte si me dices lo que pasó.

translation.en: They weren't supposed to go back, Will.
They weren't supposed to be there.
Who wasn't supposed to be there?
Light a man's house on fire
translation.es: Incendia la casa de un hombre

translation.en: and you find out what he truly loves.
translation.es: y averiguarás lo que realmente ama.

translation.en: -Mom? What's going on? -[alarm wailing in distance]
I don't know. Let me go check.
translation.es: No lo sé. Iré a ver.

translation.en: The building isn't on fire. The 96th floor is on fire.
translation.es: El edificio no se incendia.Se incendia el piso 96.

translation.en: We're more than a hundred stories above that,
translation.es: Estamos más de cien pisos arriba

translation.en: and the anti-fire measures will keep it there.
translation.es: y el sistema antiincendiosmantendrá el incendio ahí.

translation.en: We're perfectly safe here, I assure you.
translation.es: Aquí estamos a salvo. Te lo garantizo.

translation.en: They're coming, Will. They're gonna kill you.
translation.es: Ya vienen, Will. Te van a matar.
El incendio se contuvo en el piso 96.

translation.en: We're evacuating the floors below the fire line.
translation.es: Estamos evacuando los pisos de abajo.

translation.en: What about the people above the 96th?
The owner is in the penthouse on the 220th.
translation.es: El dueño está en el penthouse,en el piso 220.

translation.en: But the fire will never get there.
translation.es: Pero el fuego no llegará ahí.

translation.en: What about the people on other floors?
translation.es: ¿Qué hay de las personas en otros pisos?

translation.en: There's no one else above the 96th.
translation.es: No hay nadie más arriba del piso 96.

translation.en: -Come here, bud. -I'm fine, Mom. I don't need it.
translation.es: Ven, amigo. Estoy bien, no lo necesito.

translation.en: You're fine now, honey, but we're about to go out there,
translation.es: Ahora estás bien, pero vamos a salir,

translation.en: and there's a lot of smoke and a lot of bad air,
translation.es: y habrá mucho humo y aire sucio,

translation.en: and we don't want you to have an attack, okay?
translation.es: y no quiero que te dé un ataque, ¿sí?

translation.en: Georgia, dunk them all the way. Make sure they get completely wet,
translation.es: Georgia, sumérgelas para quese mojen por completo.
No, mi amor, no vamos a morir.

translation.en: Baby, we are not gonna die. We are gonna be just fine.
translation.es: No, mi amor, no vamos a morir. Vamos a estar bien.

translation.en: [Xia over radio] We're in position at the off-site control facility.
translation.es: Estamos en posiciónen el centro de control remoto.

translation.en: There you are. Baby, there's a fire in the building.
translation.es: Ahí estás.Amor, hay un incendio en el edificio.

translation.en: I know. All right, look, I can't get to you.
translation.es: Lo sé. No puedo llegar a ustedes.

translation.en: The police have the entire building locked down.
translation.es: La policía tiene aislado el edificio.

translation.en: I want you to get out of there right now.
Go inside the hallway, there should be a logistics panel.
translation.es: y vayan al pasillo.Debe haber un panel.

translation.en: If you show it to me, I can tell you where it's safe to go.
translation.es: Si lo veo, te diré dónde es seguro ir.

translation.en: Take the kids with you. I'm gonna stay on the phone.
translation.es: Lleva a los niños.Me quedaré en la línea.

translation.en: Hand me those towels. Come on.

translation.es: Aviso de ocupación en el piso 98.

translation.en: Will Sawyer's family unlocked their apartment door an hour ago.
translation.es: La familia de Will Sawyer abrió la puertahace una hora.

translation.en: They're in the building. Send two men.
translation.es: Están en el edificio. Envía a dos hombres.

translation.en: Use the manual override code on the elevators.
translation.es: Usa el código manual en los ascensores.

translation.en: [Mr. Pierce] What? Listen, the fire isn't just gonna go out.
translation.es: ¿Qué? El incendio no se está apagando.

translation.en: I can only access nominal control.
I can't lock out the on-site functions without the...
translation.es: No puedo deshabilitarlas funciones locales sin el…

translation.en: The entire system has been compromised.
translation.es: Todo el sistema está en riesgo.

translation.en: What do you mean, you're locked out? I thought that couldn't happen.
translation.es: ¿Cómo que lo bloquearon?Creí que eso no podía pasar.

translation.en: [Xia over radio] We have full control of the anti-fire systems.
Seal all the fire doors from 95 to the ground.
translation.es: Cierren las puertas de incendio del 95 al primero.

translation.en: And disable all anti-fire measures from 96 to the top.
translation.es: Deshabiliten las medidas antiincendiosdel piso 96 al último piso.

translation.en: [Will over phone] Everything's gonna be okay.
The logistics panel should be to your left.
translation.es: El panel debe estar a tu izquierda.

translation.en: All the floors above us are yellow.
translation.es: Los pisos de arriba están en amarillo.

translation.en: -What does that mean? -It means the entire fire system
translation.es: ¿Qué significa? Que el sistema antiincendiosestá desconectado.

translation.en: Sarah, listen to me. The fire is not gonna stop.
translation.es: Sarah, escúchame. El fuego no se detendrá.Salgan de ahí ahora

translation.en: I want you to get out of there right now and go up.
translation.es: El fuego no se detendrá.Salgan de ahí ahora y suban.

translation.en: Go up, keep going up, don't stop, don't look back.
translation.es: Sigan subiendo sin detenerse. - No miren atrás.- Bien.

translation.en: [Botha over radio] Now force the fire up.
Open the elevator shaft air vents
and feed it with fresh oxygen.
I give you a $6.5 billion chimney.
translation.es: les presento una chimeneade 6.5 millones de dólares.

translation.en: No one could survive that. They're gone.
[Botha] We're moving into position. You know what to do next.
translation.es: Colocándonos en posición.Ya saben qué hacer.

translation.en: -[Sarah] Go, hurry, up the stairs. -[Will] Sarah.
My family's inside. Listen to me.
I have to get to them.
So, you have full systems control from the tablet.
translation.es: Tienes un completo controlde los sistemas desde la tableta.

translation.en: All other access points to The Pearl mainframe have been encrypted.
translation.es: Encripté los demás puntos de accesoa la central de La Perla.

translation.en: The entire building now, it's locked out.
I used my own logarithmic base cipher to encrypt it,
so I am literally the only human on the planet Earth that can crack this.
translation.es: así que literalmente soy el único humanoque puede desencriptarlo.

translation.en: [Ajani] If the fire continues to climb,
it will superheat the air around the helipad, making liftoff impossible.
translation.es: sobrecalentará el aire del helipuerto,imposibilitando el despegue.

translation.en: Our departure window is closing, sir.
translation.es: Nuestra ventanade oportunidad se cierra, señor.

translation.en: I hate to say it, but it is now or never. [automated voice] Warning. Anti-fire measures offline.
translation.es: Odio decirlo, pero es ahora o nunca.

translation.en: Happy? You got to play the hero,
translation.es: ¿Satisfecho? Ya jugó al héroe y no funcionó.Es hora de irnos.

translation.en: it didn't work, it's time to go.
translation.es: Ya jugó al héroe y no funcionó.Es hora de irnos.

translation.en: [Zhao] All right, Mr. Pierce. You'll get your wish.
translation.es: Está bien, Sr. Pierce.Tendrá lo que quiere.

translation.en: [in Cantonese] What do we know about Sawyer?

translation.es: Estuvo en la Marina.Estrella de Bronce.

translation.en: FBI for six years, Hostage Rescue for eight.
translation.es: Seis años en el FBI,ocho en rescate de rehenes.

translation.en: Don't have a location on them yet.
Will Sawyer was hired as a safety assessor.
translation.es: Will Sawyer fue contratadocomo asesor de seguridad. Tenía accesoa los protocolos de seguridad.

translation.en: He had access to the security protocols.
translation.es: Tenía accesoa los protocolos de seguridad.

translation.en: Maybe he shut down the anti-fire measures.
translation.es: Tal vez él desactivóel sistema antiincendios.

translation.en: Do me a favor, go find Will Sawyer.
translation.es: Háganme un favor.Vayan a buscar a Will Sawyer.

translation.en: I'd like to ask him some questions.
I want to talk to him.
What the hell is he doing?
He's climbing above the fire line.
translation.es: Escala por encima de la línea de fuego.

translation.en: Sir, I can't protect you if you don't tell me what's going on.
translation.es: Señor. No puedo protegerlosi no me dice lo que está pasando.

translation.en: This isn't just a fire. It's a plot.
translation.es: No es solo un incendio.Es un boicot.

translation.en: -I can't say for sure. -I don't need facts.
translation.es: No estoy seguro. No necesito hechos.

translation.en: What is your gut telling you? Who's behind this?
translation.es: ¿Qué le dice su instinto? ¿Quién está detrás de esto?

translation.en: If a man like Botha wanted you dead, there are easier ways.
translation.es: Si un hombre como Bothalo quiere muerto, hay formas más sencillas.

translation.en: [scoffs] He doesn't want me dead. At least not yet.
translation.es: No me quiere muerto. Al menos, aún no.

translation.en: And lighting The Pearl on fire is the only way he can get it.
translation.es: Y solo lo conseguirá incendiando La Perla.

translation.en: Is there something I should know?
[in Cantonese] Why would anyone want to get into a burning building?
translation.es: ¿Por qué querría alguien entrara un edificio en llamas?

translation.en: [in Cantonese] Inspector... We have a last known location
translation.es: Inspector. Tenemos la última ubicación conocidade la familia de Will Sawyer.
Tenemos la última ubicación conocidade la familia de Will Sawyer.

translation.en: You're doing great. Wait, hold on. Come here.
translation.es: Lo están haciendo muy bien.Esperen. Vengan.

translation.en: -Baby, we're gonna wet these again, okay? -Okay, Mommy.
translation.es: - Vamos a mojar esto de nuevo.- Bien.

translation.en: Okay, baby. Calm down. Calm down.
That's the bridge to the waterfall. We'll keep heading up.
translation.es: Ese es el puente a la cascada.Seguiremos subiendo.

translation.en: Come on. Up the stairs. Okay.
translation.es: - Vamos. Por la escalera.- Está bien.
El helicóptero está listo para despegar.

translation.en: I see you met my associate.
translation.es: Veo que conociste a mi socio.

translation.en: Why don't you just shoot me and take it?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me disparas y lo tomas?

translation.en: You know I can't do that.
translation.es: No puedo.Y los hombres para los que trabajo

translation.en: 'Cause the men I work for will kill me
translation.es: No puedo.Y los hombres para los que trabajo me matarán si no se los llevo.

translation.en: if I don't get it back for them.
translation.es: me matarán si no se los llevo.

translation.en: You should've paid me and been done with it. But no.
translation.es: Debiste pagarme y dejarlo así. Pero no.

translation.en: Clever boys like you always think you can be clever.
translation.es: Los hombres astutoscomo tú se creen muy listos.
Te voy a mostrar algo astuto.

translation.en: I'm gonna take you and your drive
translation.es: Te llevaré a ti con tu disco duro

translation.en: And I'm going to make you watch as your building burns to ash
translation.es: Y te obligaré a ver cómo tu edificio se convierte en cenizas,

translation.en: and there's nothing you can do about it.
He sealed himself in the penthouse. Open the doors.
translation.es: Se encerró en el penthouse. Abran las puertas.

translation.en: The penthouse floor has its own subroutine.
translation.es: El piso del penthouse tieneotra subrutina.

translation.en: Zhao must have isolated that system.
translation.es: Zhao debió haber aislado ese sistema. PENTHOUSE - ACCESO DENEGADO

translation.en: I can't open the doors with this tablet.
translation.es: No puedo abrir las puertascon esta tableta.

translation.en: Wait. It looks like Will Sawyer's in the building.
translation.es: Espera. Parece que Will Sawyer estáen el edificio.

translation.en: And I've got a movement alert.
translation.es: Y tengo una alerta de movimiento.

translation.en: You're not gonna get in using force.
You need someone who knows the system.
translation.es: Necesitamos a alguienque conozca el sistema.

translation.en: And I know just the man for the job.
translation.es: Y conozco al hombre perfectopara el trabajo.

translation.en: If anyone can get in, it's him.
translation.es: Si alguien puede entrar, es él.

translation.en: He's in the building. Just need to find him.
translation.es: Está en el edificio. Solo hay que encontrarlo.

translation.en: We don't need to find him.
If you can't fix it with duct tape...
translation.es: Si no puedes repararlo con cinta,

translation.en: Then you ain't using enough duct tape.
translation.es: es que no estás usando suficiente cinta.

translation.en: All right, you were on the 98th floor, east side stairwell.
translation.es: Bien. Estaban en el piso 98. Escalera este.

translation.en: Means you would've had to go through the park.
translation.es: PISO 100PARQUE JADE Lo que significaque atravesaron el parque.

translation.en: -Stay with me, baby. Okay? Okay. -[Henry coughing]
I got them. They're in the park.
-Kids, too. -[Sarah] Do what he says. Okay?
translation.es: - ¡También ustedes!- Hagan lo que les diga.

translation.en: That's right. Listen to your mummy.
translation.es: Eso es. Obedezcan a su mami.

translation.en: [Sarah] It's okay, guys. Everything's gonna be okay.
translation.es: Tranquilos, niños. Todo va a estar bien.

translation.en: Just do exactly what I say.
translation.es: Hagan exactamente lo que yo les diga.

translation.en: Just have to go up a little bit farther.
Keep going. Go all the way up to the waterfall.
I'll go around to the other side.
translation.es: Yo iré por el otro lado.

translation.en: [Mr. Pierce] I'm not supposed to kill you,
but I think your kids will be enough.
translation.es: Pero creo que con tus hijos bastará.
- ¿Estás bien?- Sí, estoy bien. Ven aquí.

translation.en: How did you get in the building?
It's a long story. Where are the kids?
translation.es: Es una larga historia.¿Y los niños?

translation.en: -Mom! Dad! -[Sarah] Oh, God, are you okay?

translation.es: - No te muevas.- ¿Dónde está tu hermana?

translation.en: She's at the top of the park by the waterfall.
-How do we get across the bridge? -[coughing]
-All right, we got to do this together. -Okay.
When I tell you to, walk it out, drop it, and go get him, okay?
translation.es: Cuando te diga, suéltalay ve a traerlo.

translation.en: Will? I'm gonna hold the bridge steady.
Oh, I got you. I got you.
-Okay. As still as you can. -[board creaking]
[straining] You can do it. You can do it.
I can't hold it anymore! Jump!
Come on. Will, what the hell is going on?
I don't know, but I got to get you guys out of this building.
translation.es: No sé, pero tengo que sacarlos.Henry no puede respirar.

translation.en: All right, these elevators operate on electromagnetic induction.
they're held in place by a fail-safe brake.
translation.es: se detiene con un frenoa prueba de caídas.

translation.en: When I cut this cable, you're gonna fall.
Just listen to me. You're gonna fall through the fire.
translation.es: Escúchame.Van a caer entre el fuego.

translation.en: The magnets are gonna kick back on
once you pass the fire line.
translation.es: cuando pasen la línea de fuego.

translation.en: But I need you to pull this handle in order to engage the braking system.
translation.es: Pero tienes que tirar de estopara activar el sistema de frenos.

translation.en: It's about 500 feet from here until the fire line.
translation.es: Hay unos 150 metrosde aquí a la línea de fuego.

translation.en: I want you to count to five and pull the handle.
In order to be brave, we got to be a little scared.
translation.es: Para ser valiente,debes tener algo de miedo.

translation.en: All right? Now, I need you to be brave right now. -Can you do that for me? -Yeah.
translation.es: Y ahora necesito que seas valiente.¿Puedes hacerlo?

translation.en: I want you to hold on to your mom.
Okay, baby. We're gonna sit down.
We're gonna brace ourselves, all right? Okay.

translation.es: Estás a salvo. Ven con nosotros.

translation.en: Just the man I was looking for.
I hear your dad knows everything about this building.
translation.es: Dicen que tu papá sabe todosobre este edificio.
Solo me interesa lo que mi socio

translation.en: what my business partner is holding behind those doors.
translation.es: Solo me interesa lo que mi socio tiene tras esas puertas.

translation.en: And you're going to get it for me.
translation.es: Y tú me lo vas a conseguir.

translation.en: The only way those doors open is from the inside,
translation.es: Esas puertas solo se abren desde adentro.

translation.en: or the fire alarm on this floor triggers it,
translation.es: O si se activa la alarma de incendios,

translation.en: but that can't happen because you took the entire system offline.
[Botha] Is that so? Well, let me tell you something.
translation.es: ¿En serio? Pues déjame decirte una cosa.
Todo el mundo tiene una debilidad.

translation.en: Once you know what he loves, you have it.
translation.es: Cuando descubres lo que ama, es tuyo.

translation.en: So now we're going to find out how much you love your family, Will.
translation.es: Ahora vamos a averiguar qué tanto amas a tu familia, Will.

translation.en: Listen to me. Opening those doors from this floor can't be done.
translation.es: Escúchame. Abrir esas puertasdesde este piso es imposible.

translation.en: You're gonna bring Zhao and what he's holding behind those doors to me.
translation.es: Vas a traerme a Zhao y lo que tiene detrás de esas puertas,

translation.en: Or I'm gonna throw your daughter off the fucking roof.
translation.es: o lanzaré a tu hija desde el techo.

translation.en: I hear it's like heaven up there.
translation.es: Dicen que es como el cielo ahí arriba.

translation.en: -No, no, no! Daddy! No! -No. Georgia! Georgia! No!
[Botha] Straight to the roof, boys. We're not gonna wait around here to burn.
translation.es: Directo al techo, muchachos.No esperaremos a que todo se queme.

translation.en: [newsman over TV] ...into the destruction of Zhao Long Ji's Pearl tower.
translation.es: …en la destrucciónde la Perla de Zhao Long Ji.

translation.en: We're getting reports of activity on the ground floor of the building.
translation.es: Tenemos informes de actividaden la planta baja del edificio.

translation.en: We're going to go live to Kowloon Plaza, where we may have some survivors
translation.es: Vamos en vivo a la Plaza Kowloon,donde podría haber

translation.en: It's difficult to imagine how anyone could have survived
translation.es: Es difícil imaginarcómo alguien pudo sobrevivir

translation.en: the raging fire on the upper floors.
translation.es: a las llamas en los pisos superiores.

translation.en: [Henry] My dad's inside. He saved us.
translation.es: Mi papá está adentro.Él nos salvó.

translation.en: -He's still inside. -[reporter] Is there any other news?
translation.es: Mi papá está adentro.Él nos salvó. ¡Sigue adentro!

translation.en: [newsman] It appears this may be the family of William Sawyer,
translation.es: Parece que la familia de William Sawyer,

translation.en: Okay. There's got to be a way to open these doors.
translation.es: Debe de haber una formade abrir estas puertas.

translation.en: Where did you put the subroutine panels that controls them?
translation.es: ¿Dónde pusiste el panel de subrutinaque las controla?

translation.en: Where did you hide it, Zhao?

translation.es: PANEL DE ACCESO A SUBRUTINAEN LÍNEA ¿Detrás de las turbinas?

translation.en: How did you get out of the building? Can you comment?
[Sergeant Han] And you claim your husband isn't involved?
translation.es: ¿Y dice que su esposo no está involucrado?

translation.en: It's not a claim. He's not involved.
How many of them did you say you saw?
One in a suit, two others in coveralls.
translation.es: Uno de traje, los otros dos de uniforme.

translation.en: The one that I spoke to, he had an accent.
translation.es: Con el que hablé parecía extranjero.

translation.en: There. Top row. Second from the right.
translation.es: Ahí arriba. El segundo de la derecha.

translation.en: Is this the man you saw?
Has a nasty crew with him, too.
High-end muscle for three different crime syndicates.
This doesn't pass the smell test.

translation.es: No es el modus operandi de Botha.

translation.en: Why would he trap himself in the fire?
translation.es: ¿Por qué se atraparía en el incendio?

translation.en: And why would he cut off his only way out?
translation.es: Y ¿por qué bloquearía su única salida?

translation.en: One of them was carrying a container,
translation.es: Uno de ellos llevaba un contenedor

translation.en: and it had a logo with wings on it, and the word "Sirin."
translation.es: que tenía un logotipo con alas. Y la palabra "Sirin".

translation.en: A BASE jump from 1,000 meters up gives you roughly
translation.es: Un salto desde mil metros te da unos dos kilómetrosde distancia de descenso.
te da unos dos kilómetrosde distancia de descenso.

translation.en: they will land somewhere within this circle.
translation.es: aterrizarán en alguna partedentro de esta área.
En una zona abierta y plana. Aislada.

translation.en: Now, they wouldn't go for Victoria Park. There's too many trees to get hung up on.
translation.es: No bajarían al Parque Victoria.Hay árboles que podrían atraparlos.

translation.en: South, they wouldn't clear the peak.
translation.es: Al sur, no librarían el pico.
Al norte, puede ser,pero la zona abierta está más lejos.

translation.en: but it's a longer haul to an open spot.
translation.es: puede ser,pero la zona abierta está más lejos.

translation.en: That's nothing. It's a construction site.
You can't seriously be considering this.
translation.es: No lo estará considerando en serio.

translation.en: For all we know, she could be in on it.
translation.es: No sabemos si ella está involucrada.

translation.en: You think I would willingly trap my own children in a burning building?
translation.es: ¿Cree que atraparía a mis hijosen un edificio en llamas?

translation.en: [in English] I think you could be playing a role.
This could all be part of your husband's plan.
translation.es: Esto podría ser partedel plan de su esposo.

translation.en: If I am wrong and it's empty, then what have you lost?
translation.es: Si me equivoco y está vacío,no pierden nada.

translation.en: But if I am right, this might be your only chance
translation.es: Pero si tengo razón, sería su única oportunidad de atrapar

translation.en: to catch the people responsible for this whole thing.
translation.es: sería su única oportunidad de atrapar a los responsables de todo esto.

translation.en: Just cut the wire, doors will open, climb back up there.
translation.es: Solo corta el cable,las puertas se abrirán y vuelve.

translation.en: Does that look like someone with a plan to you?
All right, if we're gonna get out of here, you're gonna have to tell me the truth.
translation.es: Si queremos salir de aquí,tendrás que decirme la verdad.

translation.en: How does a man like that call you his business partner?
translation.es: ¿Cómo es que un hombre asíte llama su socio?

translation.en: He handles extortion for three powerful crime syndicates.
And when I began construction on The Pearl, Botha came to me.
translation.es: Y cuando comencé la construcciónde La Perla, Botha me buscó.

translation.en: He said that if I didn't pay him, he'll cripple my labor force
translation.es: Dijo que si no le pagaba,acabaría con mi fuerza laboral

translation.en: and keep me from ever completing this place.
translation.es: e impediría que terminara este lugar.

translation.en: But what he didn't know was that I hid tracking software inside my wire transfer.
translation.es: Pero no sabía que oculté un softwarede rastreo en mi transferencia.

translation.en: As Botha laundered my payments through their offshore accounts,
translation.es: Cuando Botha lavó mis pagosen sus cuentas del extranjero,

translation.en: I was able to trace every transaction,
giving me their bank accounts, their names, their identities.
translation.es: con lo que obtuve sus cuentas bancarias,sus nombres e identidades.
Esa era mi póliza de seguro.

translation.en: Botha would never be able to extort money from me again.
But when the syndicates found out that they were compromised,
translation.es: Pero cuando los sindicatos descubrieronque estaban expuestos…

translation.en: they threatened to destroy Botha if he didn't clean up his mess.
translation.es: TRANSFERENCIA REALIZADA …amenazaron con destruir a Bothasi no limpiaba su desastre.

translation.en: If he kills me, the copies I've made will be sent to the authorities.
translation.es: Si me mata, las copias que hice se enviarána las autoridades.

translation.en: But if he gets his hands on this, the original,
translation.es: Pero si se apodera de este, el original,

translation.en: he can reverse engineer my tracking software
and hide the identities before anyone's the wiser.
translation.es: y ocultar sus identidadesantes de que alguien se dé cuenta.

translation.en: So, he lit this entire building on fire
knowing that you would take the most valuable thing in this world to you and run.
translation.es: sabiendo que tomaríasel objeto más valioso para ti y correrías.

translation.en: -And his plan worked. -Not yet, it hasn't.
translation.es: Y su plan funcionó. Todavía no.

translation.en: We're gonna give Botha what he came here for.
translation.es: Le daremos a Botha lo que busca.

translation.en: As soon as he has the drive, he'll kill us both.
translation.es: En cuanto tenga el disco, nos matará.

translation.en: And her life is what matters to me, not mine.
translation.es: Su vida es lo que me importa, no la mía.

translation.en: Now, I'm taking that drive to the roof.
translation.es: Ahora llevaré ese disco al techo.

translation.en: You could either be attached to it or not.
translation.es: Puedes ir con él o no.

translation.en: I knew you'd find a way.

translation.es: y yo tengo algo que es suyo.
y traiga a Zhao. No. Primero mi hija.

translation.en: -I can't let you do this. -Hey, what are you doing?
translation.es: ¡No puedo permitirlo! ¿Qué haces?Ese no era el plan.

translation.en: -This is not in the plan. -Turn around.
translation.es: ¿Qué haces?Ese no era el plan. ¡Date la vuelta!

translation.en: He's got my daughter. Please, don't do this to me.
translation.es: Tiene a mi hija.¡Por favor, no me hagas esto!

translation.en: -A parachute or you get nothing! -Give him your parachute.
translation.es: ¡Un paracaídas o no tendrás nada! Dale tu paracaídas.

translation.en: [Inspector Wu] It looks like you were right.
We've got armed suspects up ahead.
Stay down, don't leave the car.
Thanks. You almost had me convinced out there.
translation.es: Gracias. Casi me convences ahí afuera.

translation.en: You shoot me, I drop this
translation.es: Si me disparas, suelto esto y a la niña.
suelto esto y a la niña.

translation.en: But there's one thing you should know first.
translation.es: Pero hay algo que debes saber antes.

translation.en: [sighs heavily] I got you. I got you. I got you.
I don't know, she had it on her.
translation.es: No lo sé. Ella lo tenía.

translation.en: It looks like it controls the building.
Hey, let's wait for someone who knows what they're doing.
translation.es: Esperemos a alguienque sepa lo que hace.

translation.en: My husband and daughter are in that building,
translation.es: Mi esposo e hija están en ese edificio.

translation.en: it's on fire right now. I'm not gonna wait another damn second.
translation.es: Ahora se incendia.No voy a esperar otro segundo.

translation.en: Come here. Stay down, stay low. I'm gonna find us a way out of here.
translation.es: Ven aquí. Agáchate. Buscaré la forma de salir de aquí.

translation.en: I'm trying to bring the fire systems back online.
[panting] Daddy's got you. Daddy's got you.
I got you. Look at me. Look at me.
Daddy loves you. Daddy loves you.
translation.es: - A mí.- Papá te ama. Papá te ama.

translation.en: How the hell did you do that?
I rebooted the control systems for the entire building.
translation.es: Reinicié los sistemas de controlde todo el edificio.

translation.en: I turned it off and on again.
translation.es: Lo apagué y lo volví a encender.

translation.en: What are you gonna do now?
You okay? You okay? Are you hurt?
You've got quite a family there.
